entry.title: RT Only Arweave: Big shoutout to the crew at @developer_dao 🙌. So many amazing builders in the Arweave ecosystem have come from D_D, and everyone i...
entry.summary:
RT Only Arweave Big shoutout to the crew at @developer_dao 🙌. So many amazing builders in the Arweave ecosystem have come from D_D, and everyone is grateful for that. And (!!) the amount of positive impact @dabit3 has had on the Arweave community is frankly extraordinary.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): This Wednesday July 26th 4PMUTC/8amPST/11amEST set your reminders for this amazing D_D member opportunity. https://buff.ly/3K7CJsV Come get the low down about @onlyarweave hackathon with long time D_D members @pbillingsby_ @wise_Tyy hosted by @wc49358 so you know it will be good https://t.co/SiimBgyMXA

entry.title: RT Vedant | envoy1084.eth/lens 🛠: Participated in @developer_dao x @MinaProtocol Hackathon this week and the results are out 🥁🥁🥁 🏆 Won ...
entry.summary:
RT Vedant | envoy1084.eth/lens 🛠 Participated in @developer_dao x @MinaProtocol Hackathon this week and the results are out 🥁🥁🥁 🏆 Won third place overall for zkTalents and among the three blog post winners. Here's what we made ⬇️
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🚨 @minaprotocol x D_D 🚨 🚨 HACKATHON WINNERS 🚨 This hackathon was a great success wrapping up with 30 submissions after 8 days of hacking! There were so many great submissions, but we've narrowed it all down to: 3 Overal Winners 3 Blog Winners 3 Starter Kit Winners https://t.co/8rmXKrc9wO

entry.title: Good luck to all the @pressstartcap X Developer DAO Fellows pitching at demo day today 🤝 Huge thanks again to the @pressstartcap team, the mentors ...
entry.summary:
Good luck to all the @pressstartcap X Developer DAO Fellows pitching at demo day today 🤝 Huge thanks again to the @pressstartcap team, the mentors and all the fellows. We’re excited to see what everyone has built 🪄
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🗣️ Announcing our Fellows and Demo-day for the inaugural @PressStartCap X D_D Fellowship Program. 🏆 9 Successful Projects (2 in stealth 🥷) 🏦 $15k SAFE Grants 👭🏻 7 Week Mentorship Program 🪧 Demo-day July 20th Check out our Fellows and demo-day details below 👇🏻 https://t.co/pkD7ErLzm0
